statusLine.command: sh -c 'input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r .workspace.current_dir); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r .model.display_name); session_cost=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".cost.total_cost_usd // 0"); short_path=$(basename "$current_dir"); if [ "$session_cost" = "null" ] || [ "$session_cost" = "0" ] || [ -z "$session_cost" ]; then cost_display="\$0.00"; else cost_display=$(printf "\$%.2f" "$session_cost"); fi; if git -C "$current_dir" rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1; then git_branch=$(git -C "$current_dir" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "detached"); if git -C "$current_dir" diff --quiet 2>/dev/null && git -C "$current_dir" diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null; then printf "\033[36m📁 %s\033[0m \033[33m🌿 %s\033[0m \033[32m✓\033[0m \033[35m🤖 %s\033[0m \033[32m💰 %s\033[0m" "$short_path" "$git_branch" "$model_name" "$cost_display"; else printf "\033[36m📁 %s\033[0m \033[33m🌿 %s\033[0m \033[31m●\033[0m \033[35m🤖 %s\033[0m \033[32m💰 %s\033[0m" "$short_path" "$git_branch" "$model_name" "$cost_display"; fi; else printf "\033[36m📁 %s\033[0m \033[35m🤖 %s\033[0m \033[32m💰 %s\033[0m" "$short_path" "$model_name" "$cost_display"; fi'
